 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּג‎</span> **verb** ==melt== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּג‎</span> Ithpe\`el, [[Ps.46.7|Ps 46:7]]; [[Ps.107.26|Ps 107:26]] compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***surge*** (of the sea), Qor 18:99; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a wave***); **\*\***in view of prevailing figurative use, and of Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">(<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***be in tumult, commotion***, of sea, people, ***be agitated, perplexed***, it is perhaps dubious whether ***melt*** is original meaning; ***be moved, agitated*** is usually possibly, and even [[Amos.9.13|Amos 9:13]]; [[Ps.65.11|Ps 65:11]] (both late), where (especially Amos) ***moistening*** is suggested, this may be perhaps derived from ***agitating, loosening, dissolving***. — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּמוּג‎</span> 46:7; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּמוֺג‎</span> [[Amos.9.5|Amos 9:5]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּמוּגֵ֫נוּ‎</span> [[Isa.64.6|Isa 64:6]] (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּמַגְּנֵנוּ‎</span>, see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָגַן‎</span>] p.171 above, and compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] &gt; [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמַגְּנֵנוּ‎</span>); ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָמוּג‎</span> [[Ezek.21.20|Ezek 21:20]] — 

**1.** ***melt***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span>, at touch of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Amos.9.5|Amos 9:5]] at voice of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.46.7|Ps 46:7]] = ***faint*** (of heart), [[Ezek.21.20|Ezek 21:20]]. 

**2.** transitive ***cause to melt*** [[Isa.64.6|Isa 64:6]] (but see above) **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָמוֺג‎</span> [[Nah.2.7|Nah 2:7]] + 2 t.; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָמֹ֫גוּ‎</span> [[Exod.15.15|Exod 15:15]] + 3 t.; ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְמֹגִים‎</span> [[Ps.75.4|Ps 75:4]] — ***melt away***, figurative for be helpless, disorganized (through terror, etc.) [[Exod.15.15|Exod 15:15]] (compare context), [[Josh.2.9|Josh 2:9]]; [[Josh.2.24|Josh 2:24]]; [[1Sam.14.16|1Sam 14:16]] (compare [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]), [[Jer.49.23|Jer 49:23]], compare [[Nah.2.7|Nah 2:7]]; [[Isa.14.31|Isa 14:31]]; [[Ps.75.4|Ps 75:4]]. **Po&gt;l.** ***soften, dissolve***, active: only Imperfect 2 masculine singular suffix (subject God): <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּרְבִיבִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמֹגְגֶנָּה‎</span> [[Ps.65.11|Ps 65:11]] ***thou softenest it*** [the earth] ***with showers***; figurative, = ***dissipate*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְמֹגְגֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Job.30.22|Job 30:22]] — [[BDB#We|We]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמֹגֵג‎</span> [[Hab.3.6|Hab 3:6]] for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמֹדֶד‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מדד‎</span> **Po\`el Hithpo\`el** Perfect 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְמֹגָָֽגוּ‎</span> [[Nah.1.5|Nah 1:5]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְמוֺגָ֑ג‎</span> [[Ps.107.26|Ps 107:26]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְמוֺגַגְנָה‎</span> [[Amos.9.13|Amos 9:13]] — ***melt***, subject hills (before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Nah.1.5|Nah 1:5]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.107.26|Ps 107:26]] (in terror); hyperb. for ***flow*** [[Amos.9.13|Amos 9:13]] (of fertile hills, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִטִּ֫יפוּ הֶהָרִים‎</span>).
